SettingsGeneric.galleryPageSizeHelper: Set to 0 to disable pagination - might cause performance issues on large sets of images
SettingsGeneric.galleryClickActionHelper: Ctrl+Click and Shift+Click will always select/range-select
SettingsGeneric.exportHandleFrame: How to handle frames when exporting images
SettingsGeneric.importSavFrames: Frames to be applied when importing Cartridge dumps
SettingsGeneric.importLastSeen: Import ‘last seen’ image when importing Cartridge dumps
SettingsGeneric.importDeleted: Import deleted images when importing Cartridge dumps
SettingsGeneric.importPad: Pad images up to 144px height on import
SettingsGeneric.printerUrlHelper: If you own a physical wifi-printer, you can add it\'s URL here and check the <link>Import-tab</link>
SettingsGeneric.enableImageGroups: Enable Image Groups {groupCount, plural, =0 {} =1 {(you have one group)} other {(you have # groups)}}
